# isCompatible(_:)

**Type Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether an asset pack is an on-device foundation model adapter and is compatible with the system base model version on the runtime device.

## Declaration

```swift
static func isCompatible(_ assetPack: AssetPack) -> Bool
```

## Discussion

Use this check when choosing an adapter asset pack to download. This check only validates the asset pack name and metadata, so initializing the adapter with [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/SystemLanguageModel/Adapter/init(name:)] — or loading the adapter onto the base model with [doc://com.apple.foundationmodels/documentation/FoundationModels/SystemLanguageModel/init(adapter:guardrails:)] — may throw errors if the adapter has a compatibility issue despite having correct metadata.



## Checking compatibility

- **compatibleAdapterIdentifiers(name:)**: Get all compatible adapter identifiers compatible with current system models.

items.description: Get all compatible adapter identifiers compatible with current system models.
items.name: compatibleAdapterIdentifiers(name:)
